getSalesHistory

Overview

This call is used to fetch the rental history of a specific property; it uses the BSGv2â€™s GetPropertyDetail under sales history list node.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Additional Information

For further reading regarding BSG Elements:

  • Method_getPropertyDetail

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
id Property ID Yes

Sample Request { "op": "getSalesHistory", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "id": "9925956" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "salesHistoryList": [ { "saleDate": "21/12/2011", "salePrice": 350000, "vendors": [ "Allan Rickards White" ], "saleType": "" }, { "saleDate": "01/07/1986", "salePrice": 29000, "vendors": [ "" ], "saleType": "" }, { "saleDate": "15/12/1980", "salePrice": 34950, "vendors": [ "Colin Booth", "Diana H Booth" ], "saleType": "" } ] } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error description" } }
